title: Personal Assistant / Social Media Manager Job at Lisse Africa
content:
Lisse Africa is a dynamic human resource consulting firm with key interest in recruitment with the aim of providing employees that are professional, verified and with a good cultural fit. At Lisse Africa, our aim is to build the world's most valued Recruitment Solution Company to Clients, Candidates, Colleagues and the communities where we work and live with regards to staff recruitment, background verification and other HR solutions. We solely focus on the enhancement of client organizations by providing quality services on various aspects of their human resources and by letting the organization focus on its core issues.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Personal Assistant / Social Media Manager
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid - 2 days physically and 3 days remotely)

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Personal Assistant to support our client.
	The successful candidate will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth operation running of the clients schedule,run errands and handle her social media pages.


Responsibilities


	Manage and maintain executive calendars, including scheduling appointments, meetings, and travel arrangements.
	Manage the brand of the MD and her social media handles.
	Prepare and edit correspondence, presentations, reports, and other documents.
	Handle confidential information with discretion and professionalism.
	Assist in the preparation of expense reports and other financial documents.
	Coordinate and facilitate internal and external meetings, including preparing agendas and taking minutes.
	Conduct research and compile information for various projects and initiatives.
	Serve as a liaison between executives and other staff members, clients, and external stakeholders.
	Assist with special projects and other duties as assigned.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience preferred.
	Experience: 2 years
	Proven experience as a personal assistant or similar role.
	Excellent organizational and time management skills.
	Ability to manage social media pages.
	Strong written and verbal communication abilities.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite and other relevant software.
	Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively.
	Discretion and confidentiality in handling sensitive information.
	Strong attention to detail and accuracy.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: tegarecruits@gmail.com using "Personal Assistant / Social Media Manager" as the subject of the mail.

title: Assistant Project Manager Job at Ecozar Technologies
content:
Ecozar Technology is a leading solar energy company in Nigeria. Specializing in the design, installation and maintenance of micro and mini grid solar projects and inverter power backup solutions. Ecozar Technology is not just any solar company; we stand as a trusted solar energy company in Nigeria, leading the pack among the top solar companies in Lagos our unwavering commitment to meeting the power requirements of Nigeria is evident in every project we undertake, fueled by our passionate pursuit of solar installation excellence across Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Project Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Summary


	We are looking for an Assistant Project Manager to join our team and support the organization while providing oversight on projects within our organization.
	Assistant Project Manager’s responsibilities include coordinating with different departments to ensure projects are completed on time. This role is also responsible for performing administrative tasks such as preparing invoices, building estimates and scheduling meetings as needed.
	Ultimately, you will work with various teams and stakeholders to monitor project progress and provide oversight to ensure projects are completed promptly and within budget.


Responsibilities


	Research information to support other teams and departments as needed
	Perform administrative tasks such as preparing invoices, estimates, scheduling meetings, etc.
	Keep track of and report on project progress
	Complete any tasks assigned by the Project Manager in an efficient and timely manner
	Perform other duties assigned by the Project Manager orderly and efficiently


Requirements and Skills


	Candidates should possess HND / NCE /B.Sc Degree
	Proven work experience as an Assistant Project Manager or similar role
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and project management software
	Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written
	Highly organized and able to multitask and oversee several projects simultaneously
	Strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills
	A high school diploma or equivalent is required
	Relevant training and/or certifications as an Assistant Project Manager


Salary
N300,000 - N400,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: ecozartechnologiesltd@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Job Openings at Agiville Industries Limited
content:
Agiville Industries Limited is a manufacturing company based in Mile 2, Lagos involved in the mass production of high quality plastic environmental waste bins for domestic, commercial and industrial use.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Sales Executive

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) and Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Meet sales target given to you by the Company.
	Maintain relationship with distributors, retailers, special projects supplies, provide incentive and encourage an increase in patronage.
	Maintain a competitive edge over other competitors.
	Ensure accurate and timely preparations of all the company forms and documents that facilitates sales e.g. Quotes, Invoices etc.
	Plan and carry out direct marketing activities to agreed budget, sales volumes, values, product mix and timescales.
	Respond to and follow up sales enquires by post, telephones, and personal visits. All emails correspondence must be copied the management for information.
	Develop new customers and new markets.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND, BSc Degree with 5 years of experience.


Salary
N100,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 5th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send CV to: lagosproductionjobs@yahoo.com using the Job Position and prefered Location as the subject of the email.

 


2.) Production Engineer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities 


	Overseeing maintenance and operation procedures for the complete manufacturing process and auxiliary services necessary for production.
	Supervise the work of junior staff.
	Input of proper settings on control panels of production equipment.
	Planning and organizing maintenance schedules.
	Assessing project and resource requirements.
	Provision of training for other technical staff.
	Implement routine training programmes for technical and production staff.
	Maintaining quality control standards.
	Perform repairs and routine maintenance on all production and auxiliary equipment.


Requirements


	Must be a Mechanical Engineering graduate with 6 years of experince in Injection Machine or plastic production.


Salary
N200,000 per month.

Application Closing Date: 29th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: lagosproductionjobs@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Cook / Steward

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Clean the house
	Wash and iron cloths (with a washing machine).


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an OND / SSCE / GCE / NECO with at least 10 years of experience.
	Must be a certified cook from a reputable institution
	Must be able to cook both local and international dishes.


Application Closing Date: 24th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: lagosproductionjobs@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
